alert.note: Alert for Tooele and Rush Valleys (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Hard Freeze Warning issued October 22 at 2:18PM MDT until October 23 at 9:00AM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MDT THIS EVENING... ...HARD FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM TO 9 AM MDT SUNDAY... ...HARD FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM TO 9 AM MDT MONDAY... * WHAT...For the first Hard Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 23 expected. For the second Hard Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 16 expected. For the Wind Advisory, southwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts to 50 mph. * WHERE...Tooele and Rush Valleys. * WHEN...For the first Hard Freeze Warning, from 2 AM to 9 AM MDT Sunday. For the second Hard Freeze Warning, from 2 AM to 9 AM MDT Monday. For the Wind Advisory, until 6 PM MDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. A few power outages are possible. Travel will be difficult due to crosswinds, especially for high profile vehicles and vehicles with trailers. Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects. Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
